alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 1:23PM MST until November 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT FRIDAY NIGHT TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wintry mix of light freezing drizzle, light freezing rain, light snow, and freezing fog. * WHERE...Permian Basin and most of Lea County. * WHEN...Late Friday night through noon Saturday. * IMPACTS...Light ice on exposed surfaces may impact travel in some areas, especially Saturday morning. Check on pipes, plants, and people. Wind chills of 15 to 20 degrees are expected Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads, walkways, and limited visibilities. Use caution while driving.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
